vtkio module¶

vtkio.addPolyLineToDataSet(polyData, points)¶
vtkio.appendCellData(dataSet, arrayName, values)¶
vtkio.appendPointData(dataSet, arrayName, values)¶
vtkio.createFolder(directory)¶
vtkio.createPolyData(points)¶
vtkio.createPolyLine(points)¶
vtkio.getBlockByName(dataSet, name)¶
vtkio.printBlockNames(dataSet)¶
vtkio.readDataSet(fileName)¶

Read the dataset from a file. The reader type used is determined from the file extension.

Returns:
File ext. Return type
.vtp vtkPolyData
.vtu vtkUnstructuredGrid
.vti vtkImageData
.stl vtkPolyData
.case vtkMultiBlockDataSet
vtkio.writeDataSet(dataSet, fileName)¶

Write a vtk dataset to a file, the type of writer used is determined from the fileName-extension and the type of the provided dataset. The following combinations are currently supported:

File ext. Dataset File writer
.vtp vtkPolyData vtkXMLPolyDataWriter
.vtu vtkUnstructuredGrid vtkXMLUnstructuredGridWriter
.vtk vtkPolyData vtkPolyDataWriter
vtkUnstructuredGrid vtkUnstructuredGridWriter
vtkImageData vtkImageDataWriter
Raises:
RuntimeError:If the file extension and dataset type provided are not supported (i.e. not in the above table)
